Financial Reports - YouTube Shorts 
bookmark_border
On this page
YouTube Shorts revenue summary
Monthly YouTube Shorts music label content owner revenue summary
Monthly YouTube Shorts music publisher content owner revenue summary
YouTube Shorts ads revenue
Monthly YouTube Shorts global ad revenue summary
Daily YouTube Shorts ad revenue summary
Monthly YouTube Shorts country ad revenue summary
Monthly YouTube Shorts ad revenue summary

These are reports for revenue gained from YouTube Shorts content.

YouTube Shorts revenue summary

These reports summarize revenue from YouTube Shorts.

Monthly YouTube Shorts music label content owner revenue summary

This monthly report summarizes the revenue for YouTube Shorts for music labels.

The reportType id for this report is music_content_owner_shorts_revenue_summary_a1.

Contents
Primary Key:
payment_period
country

Additional fields:
shorts_monthly_pool_usd
pool_participating_rate
shorts_usages_marketshare
shorts_flat_fee_revenue_usd

Monthly YouTube Shorts music publisher content owner revenue summary

This monthly report summarizes the revenue for YouTube Shorts for music publishers.

The reportType id for this report is publisher_content_owner_shorts_revenue_summary_a1.

Contents
Primary Key:
payment_period

Additional fields:
shorts_monthly_pool_usd
pool_participating_rate
unlaunched_territories_adjustment
shorts_usages_marketshare
shorts_partner_revenue_usd

YouTube Shorts ads revenue

These reports contain revenue from ads shown on YouTube Shorts.

Monthly YouTube Shorts global ad revenue summary

This monthly report summarizes the ad revenue for YouTube Shorts.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_shorts_global_ad_revenue_summary_a1.

Contents
Primary Key:
adjustment_type

Additional fields:
total_views
partner_revenue

Daily YouTube Shorts ad revenue summary

This daily report summarizes the ad revenue for YouTube Shorts.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_shorts_day_ad_revenue_summary_a1.

Contents
Primary Key:
adjustment_type
day

Additional fields:
policy
total_views
partner_revenue

Monthly YouTube Shorts country ad revenue summary

This monthly report summarizes the ad revenue for YouTube Shorts by country.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_shorts_country_ad_revenue_summary_a1.

Contents
Primary Key:
adjustment_type
country

Additional fields:
policy
total_views
partner_revenue

Monthly YouTube Shorts ad revenue summary

This monthly report summarizes the ad revenue for YouTube Shorts.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_shorts_ad_revenue_summary_a1.

Contents
Primary Key:
adjustment_type

Additional fields:
video_id
video_title
video_duration_sec
category
channel_id
uploader
content_type
policy
total_views
net_partner_revenue_post_revshare

YouTube Shorts subscription revenue

These reports contain YouTube Premium subscription revenue from YouTube Shorts.

Monthly YouTube Shorts subscriptions revenue summary

This monthly report summarizes the subscriptions revenue for YouTube Shorts.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_shorts_red_revenue_summary_a1.

Contents
Primary Key:
adjustment_type
month
country

Additional fields:
owned_subscription_views
net_partner_revenue

Monthly YouTube Shorts subscriptions revenue video summary

This monthly report summarizes the subscriptions revenue for YouTube Shorts by video.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_shorts_red_revenue_video_summary_a1.

Contents
Primary Key:
adjustment_type
day
country
custom_id

Additional fields:
content_type
video_id
video_title
video_duration_sec
username
uploader
channel_id
owned_subscription_views
partner_revenue
